comment: hmmm... I'll give that some thought, but it doesn't match my observations.. we're working at the margins - most (NE) asian women don't divorce - so each instance must be examined for what drove the leap, and all I've ever seen is "drama+$$$=tingles"... tingles need both ingredients every time I've seen a divorce "drama+poor" isn't enough, nor "boring+$$$"
